concept.title: Data Preview
concept.shortdesc: You can preview data to help build or fine-tune a pipeline. When you preview data, the reads records from the origin and passes it through the pipeline. You can examine input and output data for one stage at a time or for a group of stages.

conbody.p: When you preview data for a single stage, the Preview panel displays the input and output data for the selected stage. You can select any stage to view the input and output data for the stage.
You can also preview data for a group of stages to verify how the group processes data.
When you preview data, you can edit the data and pass it through the pipeline to review the results of the changes throughout the pipeline.
You can also refresh preview to review the pipeline with a new set of data from the origin.
